thread.title: Tokyo: UN SC Must Send Strong Message to North Korea Over Missile Test
thread.title_full: Tokyo: UN SC Must Send Strong Message to North Korea Over Missile Test

title: Tokyo: UN SC Must Send Strong Message to North Korea Over Missile Test
text:
Tokyo: UN SC Must Send Strong Message to North Korea Over Missile Test © AFP 2016/ TOSHIFUMI KITAMURA Get short URL 1 48 0 0 Tokyo expects the UN Security Council to send a strong message to North Korea after it fired another ballistic missile toward Japan, Foreign Minister Fumio Kishida said Sunday. © REUTERS/ KCNA North Korea Fires Ballistic Missile TOKYO (Sputnik) — Kishida stressed Pyongyang’s missile launch was a provocation and a violation of the UNSC resolution, which prohibits it from carrying out ballistic missile tests.
Japan’s National Security Council met earlier in the day to discuss the launch. Defense Minister Tomomi Inada said the military was collecting information on the missile. Its type has not been determined. 
The unidentified missile was reportedly launched from an airbase in the western province of North Pyongan and travelled around 300 miles before plunging into the Sea of Japan outside of the Japanese exclusive economic zone. ...
